explains: n. 假定，假设；取得，承担
wordGroup: on the assumption that 假设
fundamental assumption n. 基本假定

sentences.en: His actions were based on a false assumption.
sentences.cn: 他的行为基于错误的设想。

sentences.en: The whole argument rests on a false assumption.
sentences.cn: 整个论证都是基于一个错误的假设。

sentences.en: We are working on the assumption that it was a gas explosion.
sentences.cn: 我们正依据它是一起燃气爆炸的假设而行动。
